bank
Class Bank

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--bank.Bank
public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object

This class collects and manipulates a set of Accounts stored in an array.

          Constructor to set up the bank with the default number of accounts

Method Detail

addAccount

public void addAccount(Account a)
                throws NoMoreAccountsException,
                       AccountExistsException
Add a new account to the bank.

Parameters:
a - the new account to be added to the bank
Throws:
NoMoreAccountsException - when no more accounts are allowed
AccountExistsException - when an account with the given number already exists. The associated message will be the account number as a String.

getAccount

public Account getAccount(int accountNumber)
                   throws NotFoundException
Get an account from the bank.

Parameters:
accountNumber - the account number
Returns:
the Account object
Throws:
NotFoundException - when there is no account with the specified number. The associated message will be the requested account number as a String.

                   throws NotFoundException
Remove an account from the bank.

Parameters:
accountNumber - the account number
Throws:
NotFoundException - when there is no account with the specified number. The associated message will be the requested account number as a String.
